item.title: 2020 Participants
item.description: Good luck to all the teams involved in the 2020 WRCCDC Season!

item.title: Acknowledgements
item.description: WRCCDC is brought to you by volunteers, who put in countless hours of work every week. Without their help, this competition would not be possible. We would like to take the opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work and contribution.

item.title: Team Documentation
item.description: Looking for past documents or import forms? Look no further.

item.title: 2020 Regionals Teams

item.title: Competition Format
item.description: Since the Western Regional of CCDC covers a large region of schools, we host multiple, invitationals each year to give many schools the opportunity to participate in the competition.

item.title: Testimonials
item.description: Why Support WRCCDC … our student competitors share why.

item.title: 2019/2020 Season Dates
item.description: We are pleased to announce the dates for the WRCCDC 2020 season! We wanted to annouce these dates early to make sure people had enough time to plan.

item.title: Competition Rules
item.description: The following are the approved national rules for the 2019-2020 CCDC season. Please refer to the official rules for your specific CCDC event for any local variations. WRCCDC largely follows National CCDC rules, however there are minor differences between this and other regions. Contact organizers@wrccdc.org if you have questions.

item.title: Mission
item.description: The mission of the Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) system is to provide a controlled, competitive environment for institutions with an information assurance or computer security curriculum to assess their student’s depth of understanding and operational competency in managing the challenges inherent in protecting a corporate network infrastructure and business information systems.

item.title: History
item.description:
February 27 & 28, 2004

A group of educators, students, government and industry representatives gathered in San Antonio, Texas, to discuss the feasibility and desirability of establishing regular cyber security exercises with a uniform structure for post-secondary level students.

item.title: Sponsorship Information
item.description: Build and recruit future cyber security professionals by supporting WRCCDC. WRCCDC accepts in-kind donations, like equipment or software, and donations in any amount. The amounts specified below include recognition of the donor’s support.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you need to contact us, feel free to use the form below. We are also available on Social Media. This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required.

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: We would like to take the time to thank all of our sponsors for their support. Without their contributions, this competition would not be possible. If you’re interesting in sponsoring for next year, our call for Sponsors for the 2020 season is now open! Please see our Sponsorship Information Page under the support section for more information.
